item1:
使用者登录密码变更
Change of user login password
item2:
变更指定的使用者登入系统密码
Change the specified user login system password
item3:
系统管理员或使用者
System administrator or user
item4:
已有使用者的基本数据
Basic data of existing users
item5:
使用者编码、原密码、新密码
User ID, original password, new password
输出
item6:
更新使用者密码
Update user password
异常处里
item7:
如果变更失败或是密码要求不符时，系统将提示错误信息；
If the change fails or the password requirements do not match, the system will prompt an error message;
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入使用者编码、原密码及新密码后点选Change变更
Enter user ID, original password and new password and click Change
2. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
3. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
item9:
设定完密码后需重新登入系统方可生效
After setting the password, you need to log in the system again to take effect.
备注
